duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform tissue culture with roller bottle tissue culture vessels.
Assist in the preparation of growth medium.
Clean room work requires daily gowning with sterile hooded coveralls, goggles, facemask, gloves, and boot coverings.
Various support duties to include dishware preparation, stocking supplies, and housekeeping.
Follow aseptic laboratory and quality SOP’s and adhere to Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in life-science (preferred) or an Associates degree or High School diploma with some applicable experience.
